tasks.task: Pruning and maintenance of fruit trees.
subtasks: Thinning out excessive branches (e.g., those growing straight up or too far out).
Leaving a terminal bud to promote outward growth (not inward branching).
Training the new top growth by staking and tying with bamboo.
Regular pruning to maintain tree height and shape (e.g., after 10 years).
Thinning fruit clusters in June (using the thumb and little finger to measure cluster spacing).
Recommending Raintree Nursery as a resource for fruit trees and knowledge.
Creating a video tutorial on fruit tree care.
Including personal reflections and gratitude towards knowledge sharers.
Promoting a coupon code for Raintree Nursery.
Encouraging viewers to click "thumbs up" and subscribe for future videos.
